text:
November 27, 19f?9
Dr. Marshall McLuhan
96 Saint Joseph Street
Toronto 5>, Ontario, Canada
Dear Marshall:
Could you give m Phil Deane’s address? Like a fool I didn’t record
it from our taxi ride. Thought I might send him son© stuff on the
NAEB.
Hope we get word from Stone, soon* I’ve been trying. If you have
phase dates, hat me knew. And send along report of progress to
date, when possible {before I go to Washington for ray meetings.)
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skornis
Executive Director
HJSsjp
